get.summary: Get a list of analyses for the authorized user. Required roles: xpl-property-analytics-execute
Get an analysis by identifier. Required roles: xpl-property-analytics-execute
get.description: An authorized user may only request its own analyses.

put.summary: Update an analysis by identifier. Required roles: xpl-property-analytics-modify
put.description: An authorized user may only update its own analyses.

delete.summary: Delete an analysis by identifier. Required roles: xpl-property-analytics-modify
delete.description: An authorized user may only delete its own analyses.

post.summary: Create a new analysis. Required roles: xpl-property-analytics-modify

get.summary: Get a list of data buckets for the authorized user. Required roles: xpl-data-bucket-execute
Get a data bucket by identifier. Required roles: xpl-data-bucket-execute
get.description: An authorized user may only request its own data buckets.

put.summary: Update a data bucket by identifier. Required roles: xpl-data-bucket-modify
put.description: An authorized user may only update its own data buckets.

delete.summary: Delete a data bucket by identifier. Required roles: xpl-data-bucket-modify
delete.description: An authorized user may only delete its own data buckets.

post.summary: Create a new data bucket. Required roles: xpl-data-bucket-modify

get.summary: Get a list of configurations for all entities. Required roles: xpl-frontend-base-execute

post.summary: Get entity configurations for provided labels. Required roles: xpl-frontend-base-execute

get.summary: Get binary data of a file by identifier. Required roles: xpl-gbs-filestorage-execute

parameters.name: inline
parameters.description: Whether to set Content-Disposition header to inline or not

delete.summary: Delete a file by identifier. Required roles: xpl-gbs-filestorage-modify

get.summary: Get a list of files based on the file type. Required roles: xpl-gbs-filestorage-execute
get.description: Only returns metadata, no binary data.

post.summary: Upload a single or multiple files. Required roles: xpl-gbs-filestorage-modify

get.summary: Get binary data of a file by file name and file type. Required roles: xpl-gbs-filestorage-execute

parameters.name: inline
parameters.description: Whether to set Content-Disposition header to inline or not

get.summary: Get binary data of a file by full file name. Required roles: xpl-gbs-filestorage-execute
get.description:
Can be called with either a signed URL or Bearer token. Parameters 'expires' and 'signature' are only required for
signed URLs.

parameters.name: inline
parameters.description: Whether to set Content-Disposition header to inline or not

head.summary: Get binary data of a file by full file name. Required roles: xpl-gbs-filestorage-execute
head.description:
Can be called with either a signed URL or Bearer token. Parameters 'expires' and 'signature' are only required for
signed URLs.

parameters.name: inline
parameters.description: Whether to set Content-Disposition header to inline or not

post.summary: Execute a cypher query. Required roles: xpl-gbs-base-execute, xpl-scope-execute (if scope is provided)

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: NodeId of a node the result should be filtered by

post.summary:
Get a list of edges based on the in- and outgoing relationships to neighbors. Required roles: xpl-gbs-base-execute,
xpl-scope-execute (if scope is provided)

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: NodeId of a node the result should be filtered by

get.summary: Get a list of all existing edge labels. Required roles: xpl-gbs-base-execute
Get a list of all defined viewpoints. Required roles: xpl-view-points-execute

Get nodes based on the definition of the provided viewpoint identifier. Required roles: xpl-view-points-execute,
xpl-scope-execute (if scope is provided)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of a viewpoint that should be applied

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: NodeId of a node the result should be filtered by

get.summary: Get the sub graph of a node. Required roles: xpl-gbs-base-execute, xpl-scope-execute (if scope is provided)
get.description:
The sub graph only considers primary (hierarchical) relationships. If a node would be part
of the sub graph but it's relationship is not defined to be hierarchical, the node is ignored.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: NodeId of a node the sub graph should be returned for

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: NodeId of a node the result should be filtered by

post.summary:
Find the shortest path between at least two nodes. Required roles: xpl-gbs-base-execute, xpl-scope-execute (if
scope is provided)

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: NodeId of a node the result should be filtered by

requestBody.description: NodeIds to find the shortest path for

post.summary: Get one or more nodes with metadata. Required roles: xpl-gbs-base-execute, xpl-scope-execute (if scope is provided)
post.description:
Metadata can be configured in the request where 'includeAllMetadata' overrules all other configuration flags.
If 'includeAllMetadata' is set to true, all metadata is returned regardless of other configuration parameters
being set to false.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: NodeId of a node the result should be filtered by

requestBody.description: NodeIds to be retrieved and configuration of which metadata to include

post.summary: Get a dictionary of geometry file links and corresponding transformations.
post.description:
While geometry files are only considered for the provided nodeIds, transformations are taken
from directly related nodes. Geometry file links pointing to EXPLORE's file storage are
returned as signed URLs.

get.summary: Get instant3Dhub related configurations.

post.summary:
Get a list of integration actions for provided labels. The "Script" of an action can only be retrieved by calling
/api/integrations/actions/{id} endpoint for a specific action. Required roles: xpl-gbs-integrations-execute

parameters.name: runtimeType
parameters.description: If present, only return actions for provided type. Supported types: JavaScript, Python

post.summary:
Get an action where placeholders in "Script" are replaced by values based on provided nodeIds. Required roles:
xpl-gbs-integrations-execute, xpl-scope-execute (if scope is provided)

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: NodeId of a node the result should be filtered by

requestBody.description: NodeIds based on which values for script placeholders are determined

get.summary: Get a list of all available interop templates. Required roles: xpl-interop-templates-execute
Validate a data bucket against it's interop template. Required roles: xpl-interop-templates-execute
get.description:
If no interop template is attached, validation is successful. Otherwise it is verified that
a data bucket contains all labels defined in the attached interop template. If validation
fails, missing labels are returned in the response.

get.summary:
Export nodes and properties of a data bucket according to it's interop template. Required roles:
xpl-interop-templates-execute
Get a list of label filters for the authorized user. Required roles: xpl-frontend-base-execute
Get a label filter by identifier. Required roles: xpl-frontend-base-execute
get.description: An authorized user may only request its own analyses.

put.summary: Update a label filter by identifier. Required roles: xpl-frontend-base-execute
put.description: An authorized user may only update its own label filter.

delete.summary: Delete a label filter by identifier. Required roles: xpl-frontend-base-execute
delete.description: An authorized user may only delete its own label filter.

post.summary: Create a new label filter. Required roles: xpl-frontend-base-execute

get.summary: Returns a list of all licensed modules and their support type.

post.summary: Authenticate a user or client.
Verify validity of an access token.
Get a new access token by using a refresh token.
Create signed URLs. Required roles: xpl-gbs-filestorage-modify
post.description:
Only URLs pointing to EXPLORE's file storage will be signed. All other URLs
will be returned as is.

get.summary: Get a list of all defined scopes. Required roles: xpl-scope-execute

post.summary: Get one or more nodes. Required roles: xpl-gbs-base-execute, xpl-scope-execute (if scope is provided)

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: NodeId of a node the result should be filtered by

get.summary: Get node settings for all entities. Required roles: xpl-frontend-base-execute
Get a property's configuration. Required roles: xpl-frontend-base-execute
Get the configuration of all available properties. Required roles: xpl-frontend-base-execute
Get a list of property filters for the authorized user. Required roles: xpl-frontend-base-execute
Get a property filter by identifier. Required roles: xpl-frontend-base-execute
get.description: An authorized user may only request its own analyses.

put.summary: Update a property filter by identifier. Required roles: xpl-frontend-base-execute
put.description: An authorized user may only update its own property filter.

delete.summary: Delete a property filter by identifier. Required roles: xpl-frontend-base-execute
delete.description: An authorized user may only delete its own property filter.

post.summary: Create a new property filter. Required roles: xpl-frontend-base-execute

get.summary: Get a list of property groups and it's properties by label (entity name). Required roles: xpl-frontend-base-execute

post.summary: Get a list of related nodes. Required roles: xpl-gbs-base-execute, xpl-scope-execute (if scope is provided)
post.description:
Related nodes are considered to a depth defined by the provided 'limit'. Intermediate nodes
that are defined as group nodes, are ignored.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: NodeId of a node the result should be filtered by

requestBody.description: Define depth limit, labels and nodeIds to find related nodes for

post.summary:
Get a list of labels and a count of related nodes per label. Required roles: xpl-gbs-base-execute,
xpl-scope-execute (if scope is provided)

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: NodeId of a node the result should be filtered by

requestBody.description: Define depth limit and nodeIds to count related nodes for

post.summary:
Get a list of successor nodes having the same label as the provided nodes. Required roles: xpl-gbs-base-execute,
xpl-scope-execute (if scope is provided)

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: NodeId of a node the result should be filtered by

requestBody.description: NodeIds successors with same labels should be returned for

post.summary:
Get a count of successor nodes having the same label as the provided nodes. Required roles: xpl-gbs-base-execute,
xpl-scope-execute (if scope is provided)

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: NodeId of a node the result should be filtered by

requestBody.description: NodeIds a count of successors with same labels should be returned for

post.summary:
Get a dictionary of nodeIds with distances to each provided label. If no related nodes are found for a label within
the provided limit, -1 is returned. Required roles: xpl-frontend-base-execute, xpl-scope-execute (if scope is
provided)

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: NodeId of a node the result should be filtered by

requestBody.description: Define depth limit, labels and nodeIds to calculate distances for

get.summary: Get a list of sandboxes for the authorized user. Required roles: xpl-sandbox-execute
Get a sandbox by identifier. Required roles: xpl-sandbox-execute
get.description: An authorized user may only request its own sandboxes.

put.summary: Update a sandbox by identifier. Required roles: xpl-sandbox-modify
put.description: An authorized user may only update its own sandboxes.

delete.summary: Delete a sandbox by identifier. Required roles: xpl-sandbox-modify
delete.description: An authorized user may only delete its own sandboxes.

post.summary: Create a new sandbox. Required roles: xpl-sandbox-modify
Search for nodes. Required roles: xpl-gbs-base-execute, xpl-scope-execute (if scope is provided)

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: NodeId of a node the result should be filtered by

get.summary: Get a list of sessions for the authorized user. Required roles: xpl-session-execute
Get a session by identifier. Required roles: xpl-session-execute
get.description: An authorized user may only request its own sessions.

put.summary: Update a session by identifier. Required roles: xpl-session-modify
put.description: An authorized user may only update its own sessions.

delete.summary: Delete a session by identifier. Required roles: xpl-session-modify
delete.description: An authorized user may only delete its own sessions.

post.summary: Create a new session. Required roles: xpl-session-modify

get.summary: Get the version of this service.
Returns the active theme. Required roles: xpl-frontend-base-execute

Returns a list of all available themes. The 'Configuration' of a theme can only be retrieved by calling
/api/themes/{id} for a specific theme. Required roles: xpl-frontend-base-execute
Get a theme by identifier. Required roles: xpl-frontend-base-execute

includeAllNodes.description: If set to true, all nodes (not only related ones) are considered.
